page.title: 02Tourism,Population,Attitudes
page.content: It is a favourite spot for holiday makers, its position off the main routes making it a place of quiet and peace. The population of about 700 who are not retired or employed in farming, travel to the surrounding towns for work in light industry or retailing. This village is noted for its caring attitude one to the other. The people, a mixture of newcomers and those who can trace their families back several generations, involve themselves in the community either throuh church or village hall projects and also help causes farther afield. You do not need to wait twenty years to become accepted as a member of the familiy of this community.
